title: India-Japan Fund to invest Rs 400 cr in Mahindra & Mahindra's unit
description: Mahindra & Mahindra has announced that the India-Japan Fund (IJF) will invest Rs 400 crore in its unit, Mahindra Last Mile Mobility Ltd (MLMML), resulting in IJF's ownership ranging between 6.06 per cent and 8.25 per cent stake. The Mumbai-based automaker and IJF have executed a binding agreement. MLMML houses the automaker's last-mile mobility business, including three-wheelers and four-wheeler SCV brands
